A sermon preached in the parish-church of St. Philip and Jacob, in the city of Bristol on Wednesday the 15th of July, 1691. Being the monthly-fast. By Thomas Cary, M.A. Vicar of the parish of St. Philip and Jacob, in the city of Bristol. Cary, Thomas, 1648 or 9-1711.
[6], 22 p.
printed by F.C. for Thomas Guy, at the Oxford Arms in Lumbard-street, London : 1691.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
=======
